Reviews.Title: all in one, all carrier in one, too
Reviews.Author: bello
Reviews.Content: nice color, it was little hard to get use to it, but 24 hours later i was able to do everything in it... loving the idea that is unlock which works with different providers ( in my case phone is att and my provider is t-mobile)...  and doesnt come with any 2 year agreement...

Reviews.Title: I recommend it.
Reviews.Author: gnahcarukas
Reviews.Content: I prefer using this phone over a touch screen.  I don't have any problems with it.  It has really good speakers.  My only complaint is that I had to buy a new charger for the phone because the one that came with it didn't work.  Overall, I thought it was a very good deal for a good phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone for an excellent price, from an excellent company.
Reviews.Author: numba9
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with this phone. I got it refurbished and I was a little concerned about that, as I have heard horror stories warning against it. But I went ahead anyway, as it was for my sons birthday and I was on a budget. The seller shipped it super quick, and in excellent condition.It's like brand new! I set it up according to directions, put my old phones chip in it, fixed the settings to my liking and VIOLA! It has been running like a charm! It has been about a month and my son absolutely loves it. He has not had a single problem with it freezing. The camera takes surprisingly clear photos and the video quality is also decent. He loves the WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities, especially.I was so pleased with this phone from this seller, that I immediately bought another for my daughter who had a birthday 2 weeks from my sons. I definitely recommend !!!

Reviews.Title: blackberry 8320
Reviews.Author: Bella Smith
Reviews.Content: I got it for my mom and she love it!  It's perfect for her, I will highly recommend it.Thank you,Bella

Reviews.Title: Low tech
Reviews.Author: lakota
Reviews.Content: The phone did not come with a manual so I went on line but was not able to download any info. about that model. I tried using it to get familiar with the functions. It kept dropping text messages and wifi would not work. Also the sound quality was not great.

Reviews.Title: Did not work properly
Reviews.Author: Blake Berry
Reviews.Content: After purchasing this phone for a friend in Africa, he said that it would just randomly turn off and not want to restart.  Sure enough after meeting up with him...it would randomly turn off and not turn on until the battery was pulled and reinstalled.

Reviews.Title: running crazy
Reviews.Author: Dinia
Reviews.Content: I had this cell phone for a month and it was running smooth until this week. Now it does not recognize my provider and it just keep going to AT&T.; I have to keep turning it off and on.

Reviews.Title: A very acceptable phone
Reviews.Author: P. Homolka
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a friend in Venezuela and it does what it says. There are three carriers in that country and since it is unlocked it can be used with either one of them. About the phone specifics I am unable to give details since I need first some feedback from the end user, besides I am not a Blackberry person.  Limited as my review is, I can attest to the fact that the phone is unlocked and runs fine with any 3G carrier worldwide, unlike a Samsung Behold T919 also purchased through Amazon which was not unlocked an had to trash it.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, works well overseas
Reviews.Author: Claudia E Reid
Reviews.Content: I brought this phone to the Caribbean and it works just fine. My suggestion is to get a new battery while you are at it. The battery that comes with it didnt work properly and it kept dropping calls. so for maximum performance get a new battery

Reviews.Title: love my phone
Reviews.Author: Norma
Reviews.Content: got this phone for my simple mobile plan and love it.  its new and was shipped quickly easy to program and fun to use.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry
Reviews.Author: nike robinson
Reviews.Content: The battery doesn't hold charge very long otherwise. It seems to be ok for now.I am not sure if the battery is new

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Raymond Jones
Reviews.Content: this was a good buy for a gift to a friend to start him off on diong b b to his friends

This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Smallest, lightest BlackBerry with full QWERTY keyboard, includes GPS for accessing AT&T; Navigator directions
Wi-Fi connectivity (802.11b/g) with free, automatic access to over 17,000 AT&T; Wi-Fi hotspots
2.0 megapixel camera with flash and 5x digital zoom; Bluetooth wireless connectivity with stereo headset support
Up to 4 hours of talk time, up to 360 hours (15 days) of standby time
